snippet: Ms. Arnold, a grande dame of postwar photojournalism who belonged to the Magnum Photos cooperative for more than 50 years, captured subjects as diverse as Marylin Monroe, Malcolm X and migratory potato pickers.
abstract: Eve Arnold, who came to be regarded as a grande dame of postwar photojournalism for her bold, revealing images of diverse subjects, dies at age 99.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Arnold, a grande dame of postwar photojournalism who belonged to the Magnum Photos cooperative for more than 50 years, captured subjects as diverse as Marylin Monroe, Malcolm X and migratory potato pickers.

headline.main: Eve Arnold, a Photographer of Bold and Illuminating Images, Dies at 99
headline.print_headline: Eve Arnold, a Photographer of Bold And Illuminating Images, Dies at 99
